title: Remove endorsement imports from User model
description:
Edit `src/backend/app/models/user.py` to remove:
1. Import statement for `Endorsement`
2. The `endorsements_received` relationship
Ensure the User model compiles and all other relationships remain intact.
acceptance_criteria:
- No `Endorsement` import in user.py
- No `endorsements_received` relationship defined
- User model imports successfully
- Backend starts without errors
